title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\WorkflowTemplatePlacement
name: WorkflowTemplatePlacement
description:
Specifies workflow execution target.

Either managed_cluster or cluster_selector is required.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.WorkflowTemplatePlacement

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.managed_cluster
params.description: A cluster that is managed by the workflow.

params.name: data.cluster_selector
params.description: Optional. A selector that chooses target cluster for jobs based on metadata. The selector is evaluated at the time each job is submitted.
